title: All My Beasts are Legendary - Novel Updates
tags: Academy   Aliens   Battle Academy   Beast Companions   Beasts   Beautiful Female Lead   Cheats   Dragons   Evolution   Fast Cultivation   Game Elements   Handsome Male Lead   Late Romance   Magic Beasts   Male Protagonist   Marriage   Monster Tamer   Multiple Realms   Mythical Beasts   Outer Space   Pets   Phoenixes   Pregnancy   Reincarnated in Another World   Transmigration   Unique Cultivation Technique   Weak to Strong   World Travel
author: Da Yu Is Fat Again   大鱼又胖了
description:
In the era of Beast Taming, Ye Xuan with his superior Beast Editor, claims that he can turn even a snake into a Divine Dragon that soars across the nine heavens. 

Hence, the little monkey he tamed became a Deific Ape. 

The little birds he raised became a ginormous roc.>
